      • setMimeType

        public T setMimeType(MimeType mimeType)
        Description copied from interface: EmailTemplate
        Specifies the kind of message that the user will receive in his inbox.
        • MimeType.HTML: the text contained in the htmlBody property will be sent
        • MimeType.PLAIN_TEXT: the text contained in the textBody property will be sent
        Specified by:
        setMimeType in interface EmailTemplate<T extends EmailTemplate>
        Parameters:
        mimeType - defines the type of message that the user will receive in his inbox.
        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.
